titleStmt.title: Von Ludwig Wittgenstein an George Edward Moore, [nach 27. 5. 1933]
titleStmt.author: Wittgenstein, Ludwig

sourceDesc.p: Original bei Timothy Moore; Kopie im BA. Publiziert (Letters, S. 160; deutsch: Briefe, S. 185; Cambridge Letters, S. 254; WiC, S. 211).

list.item: 2007/06: Conversion from Folio Flat File to XML

div.p: Enclosed please find the proof of my letter to Mind. I have made no corrections. Please read it through & see whether there is anything to be altered. I wonder whether the comma after "Now" in line 8 is necessary & that after "print". If not I'd rather leave them out. Also the comma after "think" three lines below seems to me not necessary.
